resources.string: 1. Do you experience blurry vision or have difficulty focusing on objects?
2. Do you frequently experience eye strain or fatigue, especially after extended periods of reading or screen time?
3. Do you wear any prescription spectacles or contacts?
4. Are your eyes frequently itchy, irritated or red?
5. Have you noticed any sudden flashes of light or floating spots (floaters) in your field of vision?
1. Do you experience frequent or recurring earaches or ear pain?
2. Do you often experience ringing in your ears (tinnitus)?
3. Have you undergone any ear surgeries or procedures in the past?
4. Are you exposed to loud noises on a regular basis, either at work or during recreational activities?
5. Have you noticed any discharge, odor, or itching in your ears?
1. Have you experienced a persistent sore throat for more than two weeks?
2. Do you frequently have difficulty swallowing or feel a sensation of something stuck in your throat?
3. Have you noticed any unexplained changes in your voice, such as hoarseness or voice fatigue?
4. Have you noticed any unusual lumps, bumps, or swelling in your neck or throat area?
5. Do you experience recurrent or frequent throat infections?
